title: cmd/godoc: TODOs are not quite right
body:
Watch:

$ godoc go/ast Fileset
PACKAGE

package ast
    import "go/ast"



TODO

    Does it make sense to check for sorted-ness

	first (because we know that sorted-ness is
	very likely)?

    Investigate if providing a closure to Walk leads to

	simpler use (and may help eliminate Inspect in turn).

$

Doesn't seem quite right yet.
